name: cloudformation_tutorial
description: Clouformation code to create aws resources required for News Board project

scripts.create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name cf-tutorial --template-body file://deploy.yaml --parameters file://params.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND
scripts.update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name cf-tutorial --template-body file://deploy.yaml --parameters file://params.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND

author: Dhrubaneel Das
